name: Mad Scientists On The Loose Online Quiz | Movie Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: "Colossus: The Forbin Project" is a clever tale of a super-computer that takes over. Who plays Dr. Forbin?
questions.explanation:
Eric Braden.

	With Susan Clark. "There is another system." Cold war setting, well-done. Williams is the "Incredible Shrinking Man". Kelly is in "Forbiden Planet". McCarthy is in "Invasion of the Body Snatchers".

questions.text: "The Invisible Man" is an early classic of the genre. Who played the title role?
questions.explanation:
Claude Rains.

	Rains also did "Phantom of the Opera". Tracy did "Dr Jekyll and Mr. Hyde". Pidgeon did "Forbidden Planet".

questions.text: "Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde" has been done many times. Who is the author of the novel?
questions.explanation:
Robert Louis Stevenson.

	Stoker did "Dracula". Leroux did "Phantom of the Opera".

questions.text: "2001: A Space Odyssey" is perhaps the ultimate story of machines taking over. Who played the astronaut that took the "ultimate trip"?
questions.explanation:
Keir Dullea.

	Lockwood was the astronaut who didn't make it. Taylor did "Time Machine". Nielsen did "Forbidden Planet".

questions.text: "A Clockwork Orange" deals with behavior modification therapy gone awry. Who is the author of the novel?
questions.explanation:
Anthony Burgess.

	Great job by Malcolm McDowell. All of the others are prolific sci-fi writers.

questions.text: "The Fly" is another tale of something-going-wrong with a scientific experiment. Which of the following was in the cast (of the original version)?
questions.explanation:
Vincent Price.

	One has to mention Price in a quiz of this sort.

questions.text: "Frankenstein" is perhaps the most famous "mad scientist" tale. Who is the author?
"The Manchurian Candidate" deals with "mad science" in the form of brainwashing. What is the relationship between agent Angela Lansbury and victim Laurence Harvey?
questions.explanation:
Mother-son.

	Lansbury played much older than she was. With Frank Sinatra and Janet Leigh. Creepy stuff.

questions.text: "Forbidden Planet" deals with a scientist on the edge studying an extinct species that went too far. What destroyed the race of people on the planet?
options: Their attempts to develop a super-weapon

questions.text: "The Day the Earth Stood Still" is a cautionary tale of a visiting alien who warns about "going too far". Who plays the alien?
questions.explanation:
Michael Rennie.

	Gray plays a little boy in the movie. Holliman is in "Forbidden Planet".
